title: Luna: What's Your Sleep Story?
description: An interactive web-based exploration of sleep patterns and physiology, featuring visualizations of heart rate, hormone levels, and individual nightly timelines.

title: Surgery Exploratory Visualization
description: An interactive dashboard for visualizing real-time patient vitals during surgery, revealing how physiological signals change across procedures and conditions.

title: Cyclescape: BikeWatching Visualization
description: An interactive map visualization on Boston's and Cambridge's bike traffic.

title: Persuasive or Deceptive Visualization
description: An interactive visualization exploring how design choices can either support or challenge a claim about NYPD officer misconduct.

title: Recipe Cook Time Predictor
description: Predicts whether a recipe is long or short to cook using nutrition, calorie data, and preparation steps, through a logistic regression model.

title: Image Processing App
description: A basic app that applies grayscale, negative, and rotation transformations and uses KNN to classify images based on their features.

title: Meteorite Landings Analysis
description: This project investigates patterns in meteorite landings using a dataset from NASA, computing probabilities, hypothesis testing, and analyzing mass trends over time.

title: Taylor Swift's Songs Analysis
description: This project builds a song recommender, lyric searcher, and word cloud generator using data from Taylor Swift's discography.
